Text: Enpower Production Database Outage Dec pm to Dec am PwrProdn Cc PST All We are creating storage space for legacy systems and would like to take database down for few hours Enpower production Database will be down during Dec pm to Dec am central time Here is the contact info Enpower On Call DBA pager Enpower nd On Call pager Enpower On Call Phone PortCalc On Call pager Curve Manager On Call pager Please call me at X if you have any questions Shiva Enpower Support Pager

Please relogin to Enpower Application Cc All We have migrated many Enpower applications successfully on Saturday the Dec for PwrDealStrips table change Please relogin to Enpower system for updates For further queries please call me at X Thanks Shiva

MidWest Production Rollout Cc Hi Casey For Midwest I have set it up the dependencies as below Cinergy R Cinergy Financial F OPPDNPPD RB Comed RC Comed Financial FC Manitoba RM NSP RN AEP RA TVA RB Ameren B Michigan B Illinois B We have latest curve points in the database for all Midwest regions Tomorrow onwards Traders can start marking their curves in Curve Manager System Note For next two days Traders have to mark their curves in both the systems Excel Curve Manager If you have any questions please call me at X Shiva

Temporary Enpower login id for Netco Cc PST Please use the following user id and password to login to your machine NT login then use your own login id and password for Enpower login user id nctcbentle password irmRulz If you have questions please feel free to call me at Shiva
